title: Shiying Xiao
section: Regional and sectoral structures of the Chinese economy: A network perspective from multi-regional input-output tables
text:
Regional and sectoral structures of the Chinese economy: A network perspective from multi-regional input-output tables







Published in Physica A: Statistical Mechanics and its Applications, 2021.
We analyze the regional and sectoral structure of the Chinese economy with the province-sector MRIOTs of China in 2007 and 2012 using network analysis tools.
Recommended citation: Wang, T., Xiao, S., Yan, J. and Zhang, P. (2021). “Regional and sectoral structures of the Chinese economy:A network perspective from multi-regional input-output tables”. Physica A: Statistical Mechanics and its Applications, 581, 126196. DOI
